name: The Alpaca Crew
details:
Our first alpaca sweater. With a cool rib pattern and a crew neckline, the Alpaca Crew has all the warmth of a cozy winter knit with a plush, airy feel. Alpacas are lighter on the planet with their soft hooves and gentle grazing—making them easier on pastures than other herd animals. Our airy alpaca yarn is prickle-free, long-lasting, and pilling-resistant.
We’re committed to sourcing the most ethical products across our supply chain. For all animal fibers, we take extra precautions to ensure humane treatment. For more information, check out our sustainability initiatives.
fabric: 58% Alpaca, 34% Recycled Nylon, 8% Merino Wool, Exclusive of Trimming.
review_description: Love the alpaca crew neck sweater!   I bought it in the beautiful blue and always get compliments!   It’s very lightweight but yet warm.  It also fits  comfortably under any of my coats.  Great quality and very classy!

Sweater has the relaxed fit that seems to be everywhere. I purchased the beautiful grey color because Everlane gets it right.  Not too dark, not too light just a very flattering color. Sweater is a timeless piece that blends well with most things in my closet. Sweater is very soft, warm and I hope to get a lot of wear out of it over the years.  Everlane’s products go the distance and really last if they are cared for.
This sweater fits just like the photos and is warm but also breathable, so you don't overheat! Easy to layer under and up-levels a look.
This sweater is so lovely, and warm. I absolutely love it. I have had another in a different color for a few years. Love them so much that now I have two.
Love that its light weight but still so warm!! So cozy!
dressed up or cozy at home this is my go-to sweater!

The hype is real! I want one in every color and I would wear this daily if I could. The only negative thing I can say is that it is dry clean only. I did size down from my normal top size and it was still roomy.

I first purchased the XS in almond after reading reviews.  I returned it for a small in taupe. Size is much better and in keeping with the more oversized fit that’s in style. I’m 112 pound, 5”4. Love the taupe colour, almond is nice, but washed me out. I would wear this everyday if that wasn’t weird! A tad itchy around the neck, but not annoyingly so. Have yet to wash it.

name: The Long-Sleeve Riviera Dress
details:
Our bestseller got a long-sleeve upgrade. Made from a stretchy Supima® cotton jersey, The Riviera Dress features a comfortable long-sleeve knit top with a rounded scoop neck and a voluminous woven bottom. The top portion is made from our ultra-soft and durable Supima® cotton, while the skirt is made with 100% cotton for all-day breathability. The pinnacle of versatility. Did we mention it has pockets? 

Grown in the United States, Supima® cotton is distinguished by its extra-long fiber length, which gives it more durability and a softer hand feel.  Supima® is able to authenticate the source of its cotton across the entire supply chain, from the fiber and yarn to the fabric and finished product.
fabric: Bodice: 92% Supima® Cotton, 8% Elastane Skirt: 100% Cotton

name: The Cozy Stretch Turtleneck Dress
details:
A best-seller—now better than ever.  Cozy like a blanket, stretchy like a yoga pant, easy like a dress. It’s everything you love about the original in an updated blend of RWS-certified wool and GRS-certified recycled polyester with a touch of spandex for soft stretch. Featuring an elevated neckline, relaxed fit, and ribbed detailing, this slip-on silhouette delivers high amounts of comfort and style.  

The Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) sets requirements for third-party certification to ensure that wool comes from farms that manage their land with a progressive approach, practice holistic respect for the sheep, and follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare. The standard also maintains a strong chain of custody for certified materials as they move through the supply chain to guarantee visibility, protect soil health, biodiversity, and native species on all RWS farms, as well as adhere to strict social welfare practices for the health and safety of workers.  The Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions—with the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production.
review_description: The dress is very soft, and I can wear it in the place where I live. It fits very well and I can wear it with pants or as a dress. Its texture is very soft and comfortable.
Comfortable, stretchy, but also chic and cozy. I wore this all winter… I sized down and got an M  instead of an L.
I like this, it’s very cozy and is a great length for me (5’4”)
I can’t say enough about this dress - perfect for a Canadian winter.  Worn over leggings and booties it goes from the boardroom to dinner. I bought a large and it is roomy without being sloppy.

I am 5’10 and have been on the hunt for a sweater dress that is long enough, flattering and work appropriate. This dress was on sale so I scooped it up. It fits great and has a nice length. I wear it with black tights and I love it. It is soft and not itchy. Def worth it and will get another one if it goes on sale again.
Material is soft and very comfortable. Has a slightly fuzzy look. Beautiful oversized fit. Can easily be dressed up or down.
This is the second dress I ordered in this style:) I love the comfort and style!

I guess the fit based on Everlane size guide. Invariably it is wrong. Now that I am living in Israel it is much too complicated to return. I love the dress but it just looks too big. It even looks too big on the model. I will wear it with leggings and boots with a bazar on top so it just doesn’t look too large. I still really love it. I just wish it was a better fit.

name: The Re:Down® Vest
details:
Your transitional weather go-to. Perfect for those chilly weather days, the Re:Down® Vest will keep the heat in and your body warm, ideal for layering over a sweater or under a liner. Featuring a higher collar that can be folded down or snapped up all the way for extra cozy, it has a tonal snap closure at the front, plus on-seam pockets with internal snap closures, and a slightly curved hem at the back. Puffed-up for warmth, it’s filled with recycled down feathers, while the jacket is made with our recycled GRS-certified and bluesign approved nylon and lined with recycled polyester. 

Re:Down® repurposes feathers and down from pillows, comforters, and sleeping bags to give you luxurious softness that’s 100% warm, 100% natural, and 100% recycled. With the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production, the Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions.  

In 2019, we worked with bluesign® to eliminate harmful substances from their RSL (Restricted Substance List) at each step of our supply chain—from the chemical formulas, to the processes used to manufacture materials, and the products themselves. A bluesign® certification guarantees safer processes for workers and consumers as well as reduced air and water emissions.
fabric: Shell: 100% Recycled Nylon Lining: 100% Recycled Polyester Filling: 80% Recycled Down, 20% Recycled Feathers

name: The TENCEL™ Boxy Shirt
details:
A classic—reimagined. Our best-selling Boxy Oxford now in a buttery soft, 100% TENCEL™ Lyocell fabric. With a classic point collar, dropped shoulders, a clean button front, oversized patch pockets, and a relaxed boxy shape. Polish it up with trousers and heels, or dress it down with jeans and sneakers for a casual-yet-put-together look. 

Known for its lightness and versatility, TENCEL™ Lyocell is a man-made cellulosic fiber extracted from PEFC and FSC-certified responsible wood sources. It offers the same exceptional softness as conventional cotton while using less energy and water in the production process.

name: The Classic Cotton Flannel Shirt
details: You almost don't have to say anything about a great flannel shirt—but we don't want to be too modest. This cotton flannel is brushed on both sides for a warm, soft feel you genuinely won't want to take off, and it's a nice versatile weight so you won't really have to take it off (until summer—maybe).
review_description: I had this in cream and loved it so much I bought it in green. The color is a dark olive. Super soft! I know that they get less soft as you watch them as I have one already but it’s still a great item. It’s a bit oversized as a heads up

I love this shirt. Its soft but sturdy and warm and structured and feminine because it is pastel. If they had more colors I'd go back for more. I'm often a XS in everlane but glad I got this in a S, it is fitted without a lot of room under it, might size up next time so I can layer it better.
I wear this so often in the PNW. Love love love the green color (my favorite)
Great layering piece for cool morning walks or camping out by the beach.
Love this shirt. Soft, warm, flattering Color
I wear it on top of white t- shirt with jeans and snickers and it a perfect look for me
Love this flannel. So cozy, nice length. Would buy again.
This shirt is the best I can have....fabric, stitching, overall quality
I love this flannel shirt. Fits perfectly. Stylish and good quality! The blue color is very appealing!
I was looking for a great flannel that was chic and classy. This one is a great oversized fit, I do recommend sizing down if you don't want it to be too baggy.

name: The Silky Cotton Relaxed Shirt
details:
The Silky Cotton Relaxed Shirt combines put-together polish with lived-in comfort. Made from high-twist, 100% cotton yarn in a traditional twill weave, this drapey shirt has an extra-smooth feel you usually get from decades of wear—in a roomy, slightly oversized fit that’s easy to dress up with heels, or dress down with jeans. It’s that perfect button-down you can never find, found.

Fun fact: We’re moving all of our cotton to organic. As we make the transition from conventional cotton to organic, you’ll see a mix of inventory on the site. To learn more about our organic cotton commitment, check out our Sustainability Initiatives Page.
review_description: Bought the same shirt years ago and even tho the color was wrong for me I kept it because I loved the material so I was glad to see they still sell it. They hold up well and never go out of style
This will be my "go to" white blouse! The fabric is smooth and silky and the fit it comfortably oversized without looking sloppy.

There’s something about the brown on brown stripe paired with black pants or black skirt that looks so good. It’s so soft for cotton and drapes perfectly. It just looks effortless and that’s all I want from my clothes. It’s not a traditionally sexy shirt but there’s something about it. . .
For Context: I’m a mildly frumpy 5’4”, 130 lb mom & trust that I look good in this shirt.

I’m certain I’ll wear this shirt frequently; it’s just right for the weather we have in the South. I like lightweight shirts with long sleeves to keep mosquitoes off and this shirt does that and looks good. I’m so glad I checked with customer service about sizing. I was advised to order a 10 instead of a 12 and that was the right call for me with my short torso. The 10 had more than enough length for my frame.
True to description   Nice product to add to my everlane collection.
Very soft and good quality material. Fit is excellent as well
It is the perfect material and fit. It can be worn any way. So worth it!
Just love this shirt.  I wear it over pants or as a “jacket.”  Great fit and feels crisp.  Washes up well.

name: The Long-Sleeve Supima® Square-Neck Bodysuit
details:
An understated and elevated base layer.   Slip into a foundational piece that fits like a hug. Made from a blend of soft, breathable Supima® cotton and stretchy elastane, The Long-Sleeve Supima® Square-Neck Bodysuit features a classic square neckline, form-fitting shape, and snap closure for extra ease. Style underneath a tailored blazer or wear on its own with high-waisted denim.   

Say hello to Supima® cotton. We’re transitioning our existing Pima basics to Supima®—a domestically sourced cotton with licensing programs giving us full supply chain visibility, right down to the farm level. Grown in the United States in just over 500 farms, Supima® cotton is distinguished by its extra-long fiber length, which gives it more durability and a softer hand feel, plus, it absorbs colors much better than conventional cotton.
review_description: Everlane bodysuits are the best. True to size, probably a little tight, and double layered so they're very smoothing.
It’s a perfect fit. Buttery soft and so comfortable.
Love the fabric quality and weight. The neckline is so flattering. Exceptional quality

Perfect body suit, the thickness of the fabric is just right, I’m a 34c and I feel supported with out a bra,  I noticed the sleeves feel a bit tight, I order a two of these lol in small but probably could have worn a medium comfortably too, the small fits great I’m afraid it will shrink though so I’m avoiding the dryer

People have said order a size up but I found that not to be true it is fitted but a size up makes it baggy and wrinkly. I always take everlane small and am glad the size is consistent throughout the  store. (UK 8, everlane Small). I am normally weary of bodysuits as they are often too short in the torso and so end up pulling on my shoulders and behind. This has a good length too it. Uk return process was easy.

Love this bodysuit - the double layer in the body is a great design, and the neckline is lovely. I'm typically a size 6 / M, but I bought both M and L and prefer the L (especially in the white which is generally a less forgiving color). The M felt skin-tight and sleeves were a bit short on my long arms, but L was perfect and still comfortable. Don't love the placement of the snaps compared to other bodysuits I have, and wish there were double snap options, but it's not a deal breaker.

I love this square neck bodysuit. It’s flattering and can work all year round. I purchased black and white as a winter base layer but now I am eager to wear it in spring and summer and just push the sleeves up. The material is so comfortable and my long torso appreciates the stretch. Highly recommend!
This is a super comfortable and so very flattering. Fabric and cut are great - fits true to size. Definitely recommend as a nice wardrobe stable.

name: The Boxy Oxford
details: Your favorite button-up just got a refresh. Made of soft, premium organic cotton, the Boxy Oxford features a classic point collar, dropped shoulders, a clean button front, oversized patch pockets, and a relaxed boxy shape. Polish it up with trousers and heels, or dress it down with jeans and sneakers for a casual-yet-put-together look. Either way, you’ll look like you know what you’re doing.
review_description: I have two. I started with the Medium, and bought an addition one in small. I am learning my size with Everlane, but can't turn loose the roomier option, I love having the choice.  The shirt is soft and flattering, with just the right amount of flare. I have washed them several times and I like to dry on low briefly and hang to finish drying. This gets me out of the ironing conundrum. I love them with my dream pants and my easy pants. My favorite is thing is you cannot see through these shirts! I really love the arm length, and turn the cuffs up once.
Soft, but keeps its shape. Wide, but not weirdly so. Nice color!

Fabric is a nice heavy weight, soft to the touch and looks good even if you don’t iron the shirt. No shrinking even with drying in high heat. Choose your size based on the garment dimensions because this is a boxy fit.
I exchanged the blue for a white!  It’s great. It’s full, crisp, comfortable. Received compliments when I wore it to a party last night. I’m about to buy it in striped!  Great shirt!!

I bought 7!! It is made of good quality material. I like how it is oversized. I got my size and it is pretty oversized. I could size down but I am glad I did not. I wear these to office and got so many compliments.
These shirts are made of nice thick cotton which washes well and is easy to iron. They are structured yet soft.
I now own this in 2 colours. I love the versatile style, I wear it in work and also on casual occasions.
I’m a petite UK8 and the size S overwhelms me a bit, XS is perfect for me.

I love this shirt. Heavier weight- so it’s not see through. Comes out of wash wearable and looks great ironed. It’s a great length for me as I’m shorter & I love the boxy fit, I would suggest sizing down if you’re going for a less casual look. I got my fav color in both sizes- have xl & l- usu I’m 1-2x. I took out every other Oxford from my closet as I only wear these!
I was so impressed with the quality, fit and style of the chambray boxy Oxford, I immediately ordered the pin stripe!

The versatility of this silhouette goes from layering as a light jacket over a tank top to wearing it alone to layering a sweater over it in the cooler season. This is a perfect core basic for a capsule wardrobe.

name: The Invisible Square-Neck Bralette
review_description: I have no patience for fussiness in bras, and often want compression, and i seek bras that offer coverage, compression, and narrow strap simplicity (or cross back flexibility). Sometimes I seek small strap elegance for evening or slightly fancier (for me) occasions, and this bra fits the bill. Great item.
I absolutely love the colour, its super comfy and keeps everything in place

I’m something like a 38DD, if not larger, and the XL works great for me. It’s as light and unstructured as I can get away with and still be comfortable. The band could be a smidge tighter and the cup area a smidge bigger but it’s comfortable and stays in place, I don’t find myself tugging or adjusting or eager to take it off, and it looks good both under clothes and by itself. I love the pewter color. I’ve ordered several green and green-adjacent items from Everlane lately and am liking the colors a lot.

I have so many of the seamless bras and have been wearing them nearly every day. This bra was on sale and it is by far the most comfortable bra I've ever worn. Love that you can't see it underneath a t shirt.
This is the perfect low impact training bra. It’s very thin and smoothing. I’m usually a small and bought that size. It’s similar to my SKIMS bra like this.

I did not know before this that square-neck bralette could be so comfortable and practical de wear, especially when it is so hot outside. I wear it layered under under some linen tank that have to much cleavage for my liking, the bralette is a little bit visible and it is a look that I like. Also good for hiking.
It is thicker and durable, which sometimes is rare in bralettes. Love it!

This beta is so comfortable…soft, supportive, fits well and will get more. With traditional bras, I usually can’t wait to take them off. With this bralette, I forget I even have it on! If fits well without being too tight.  Love it.

name: The Cotton Bralette
details:
Love your underwear. A sporty cut with a clean and simple look, the Cotton Bralette features fully adjustable straps, unpadded cups, and an adjustable underarm band with clasp details that feel clean and modern. Plus, it’s made of super-soft, double-layered Supima cotton that’s breathable and comfortable as can be.

International bra and underwear orders are final sale and are not eligible for returns or exchanges at this time.
review_description: This fits well and runs true to size. I tend to run hot and this is comfortable. The elastic does get saggy after a year, which is when I replace it.

I love this bra for several reasons. The cotton fabric breathes and is so much more comfortable than bras made of synthetic materials.  It also gives me just the right amount of support and does better than most wireless bras.  The top of the bra stays put and does not slide down during the day and expose your nipples.  To me, it's perfect, but unfortunately, it looks like you don't have it anymore.  I would have bought more of them.

I absolutely love this bra. I've tried multiple wireless bras and was always left disappointed either because of a lack of adjustability, or just drab appearance (we all like to feel good, right?). After purchasing Everlane’s cotton bralette, I had to come back and purchase the other colors.
Thank you, Everlane, for making this product!
This bra is the best, soft, the band fits just right and the cups are fit and give my breasts the lifts I like. Am re-ordering as I write

Or Monday or Tuesday or any day, really. I forget I have anything on, it’s so comfortable. It stays put, too — no adjusting throughout the day. I’m a 32C and took the advice of another commenter who ordered the Medium, and the two I ordered both fit perfectly.
I am shocked at how much I love this bralette. I am usually a size 4-6 (34B) and I ordered a medium and its perfect. so comfortable and even gives me some nice cleavage. I want more colours!!

This is very comfortable and supportive. It has the highest amount of cotton than any other bra I could find. Thanks Everlane! It runs a little small so I buy a M instead of my usual  S. Typically wear a 32C.
So soft and love that the bralette has adjustable straps and back clasp. Would love to see more colors available!

name: The Relaxed Oxford Shirt
details: Borrowed from the boys—but better. We took the same fabric we use for our men’s oxfords and made a modern, relaxed version just for you. Tucked in or out, unbuttoned or buttoned—it’s an everyday classic.
review_description: Finally! A button up that needs nothing worn underneath (even the white color), has a relaxed but not too boxy fit, and made of such nice, soft material. I wear these all the time both at work and socially. Wish there were more colors!
5’9” 36D, size 6 ordered is perfect with plenty of room for comfort.
Love this top. Not too oversized so if you're between sizes this is something to consider
Love the color and shape of this shirt - Whether it's a dress up to business meetings or casual wear with sport shoes, it's just perfect. I bought a size up to make it more trendy!

This is the white button up shirt I have had in my mind for years. It’s the perfect thickness, it’s not see through, not too tight, and it does not wrinkle up as soon as you put it on. It also washed really well. I hung it to dry and did not have to iron. I love it!
It's the perfect Oxford shirt. It's thicker than expected, but perfect for fall!

I can't remember when I bought my first Everlane oxford, a lovely pale pink (I did have to buy one size larger to have enough to tuck in) that was perfect for the office and late dinners, whether posh or jeans. The fabric is just the right weight to be crisp, comfortable and no-show, and washes and dries beautifully with just a shake and into my closet. I've smeared coffee, chocolate, plum and blood on this shirt, and it cleans up beautifully. Needless to say I've several shirts in multiple colors, the fit and comfort is that good.

Great shirt - looks good whether ironed or worn free from the drier a little crinkly. The fabric has a good (heavy) weight so it keeps me warm around the house; but not too warm to wear min summer. The fine blue stripe is a nice light colour (not navy blue).
Only downside…the shirts used to have buttoned collar, which meant the collar always looked good fresh out of the drier. These buttons are gone, so now need to iron / shape the collar.
I love these shirts. I have 3 that I wear all the time. I do wish you would make more colors.

name: The Rib-Knit Crew
details: Texture meets form. Slip into the slim fit of our Rib Knit Crew, crafted from a soft blend of organic cotton and LENZING™ ECOVERO™. Featuring a thicker, textured rib knit, this cozy style offers a lighter alternative to your heavy winter sweaters for warmth without the weight. Wear on its own with denim for an easy and timeless look. LENZING™ ECOVERO™ is a man-made cellulosic fiber sourced from FSC-certified wood pulp, which generates up to 50% lower carbon emissions and has a 50% lower water impact, compared to generic viscose.
review_description: I was looking for a long sleeve shirt that was a bit more than a T-shirt. This is it. Heavy weight almost sweater like, this crew is perfect. I know it will get worn again and again this fall and winter. The perfect layer that can be dressed up or down.
Only flaw is some loose threads, but I loce this sweater. if it cane in other colors that flattered me (blue, lavender, charcoal grey) I would buy.
I adore this top. These days, I purchase exclusively denim from Everlane but this top caught my eye immediately and I am glad I went for it.
Material is heftier than your normal rib knits but still slinky and quite body-hugging. The fabric has a decent recovery and doesn’t stretch out too much.
I purchased a size M which fits perfectly for wider shoulders and a larger bust while still being somewhat close-fitting at the waist.

This top is comfortable and basic but casually elevated.  I got the camel (it is not as "warm" tone as I would like and a bit more "flecked" but I like it).  It has a cotton-y feel to it.  Mid weight.  stretchy and forgiving.  Slim fit in tts but not tight.  Liked it so much I also ordered bone and black.

I got one in camel and and one in charcoal. Love! Dresses up for business casual, dresses down for weekends. The white color was more see-through than the others when I tried them on in the store. I can wear a nude bra under camel and charcoal, but you can kinda see it under the white color. Otherwise, I wouldn't hesitate to buy in more colors

I love the fabric, which is substantial rib cotton blend.  Very comfortable.  I did size up for a little ease in how it fits.  I have already worn it several times since it arrived, a sign of a great purchase!
Very soft and perfect alone or over shirts. Bought a size up to wear over shirts.
I am very impressed by the fabric, it’s breathabiliy and warmth.  I wanted white as well but it was sold out. Please restock these, Everlane!

name: The Perform Legging®
details:
Do what you want—in a legging that does it all. Made of premium performance fabric from a renowned Italian mill, the Perform Legging® features an extra-high waist, minimal seams, an interior pocket, and lightweight compression with technical sweat-wicking properties. Plus, it’s comprised of 58% recycled nylon.

Looking for more Perform items? Browse the collection and make it a set.
 
We’ve eliminated 90% of the virgin plastic from our supply chain. Learn about what we’ve done—and the challenges ahead—on our No New Plastic page.
review_description: I purchased the size of 28’’and Xs my usual size it was too tight. After exchanging with 25’’ S it fit perfectly. Very happy !
I've purchased 2 pairs of these leggings - 2+ years apart. The fit is exactly as advertised. Even better - the colour remains fast even after repeated washings.
These are my everyday go to.  Wish they were in more colors such as navy blue, dark brown, and a not see thru white or off white.

Love these leggings for lounging, working out, layering, etc. They are a great basic staple in my closet! I will say the coloring in the photos is a true pine green while they are a bit more of a sage green tone in person.
Super comfortable and nice designs. Love those pants and I got several after I purchased this one!

Wore these leggings to a hot hatha yoga class and they held up great. They stayed up for the most part, didn’t display obvious sweat marks, and the ankle length was perfect for my height (5”5). The material is lightweight and breathable but not see through. I’m not sure I’d wear them for high intensity workouts but I love them for hot yoga or just running errands.
Somewhat tight on first wear but fitted well after couple of hours exercising. 100 per cent comfortable & perfect ankle length for a 5 footer.

I just bought my first two pairs of everlane leggings and I was so pleasantly surprised at the quality and fit. They are comfortable enough for daily wear but highly functional for fitness. And the colors are great. Excited for my next pairs.

name: The ReNew Fleece Oversized Crew
details:
Your coziest crew is now softer than ever.  Our best-selling ReNew Teddy Oversized Crew—updated in extra soft, 100% GRS-certified recycled polyester. Featuring a classic crew neckline, dropped shoulders, voluminous sleeves, and an oversized relaxed fit, this signature style looks good layered over shirts and turtlenecks, or on its own.  

The Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions—with the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production.

name: The ReNew Fleece Oversized Half-Zip
details:
Half-zip, full cozy.  A new ReNew style has entered the chat, and it’s softer than ever. Made from 100% GRS-certified polyester, this extra roomy pullover features a funnel neck, patch pocket (with a zipper!), and side seam pockets. Throw it on during chilly work-from-home days or morning dog walks.  

The Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions—with the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production.

name: The ReTrack Half-Zip Sweatshirt
details:
Bringing new life to recycled fabrics in timeless styles.
Featuring a versatile zip neckline, dropped shoulders, side pockets, and a relaxed fit, The ReTrack Half-Zip Sweatshirt will soon become a perennial favorite. The best part? We remixed our ReTrack family with a more premium cotton, think a softer, thicker, warmer material, with a relaxed fit—perfect for lounging around or running errands on cooler days.

Wherever we can, we use recycled materials to lower our carbon footprint and reduce waste. Using recycled materials repurposes resources, reduces inputs, and diverts would-be-waste materials away from landfills.
fabric: 70% Cotton (26% Recycled Cotton), 30% Recycled Polyester; Exclusive of Ornamentation
review_description: This is my favorite sweatshirt ever. It has weight and is toasty warm. The fabric has a smooth and sueded high-end look. It is cut very generously in the shoulders, bodice and length yet it looks great and hits in just the right place on the hips.

I was pleasantly suprised. On the photo the sweatshirt looks a bit plain, but in reality the color, collar and zip detail make it much more interesting. The inside feels very soft and cozy. I look forward to wearing it as it gets colder!

I buy the medium because it gives enough room for layering and comfort. This versatile zip with pockets is a must for me, because winter drafts drive me crazy.  I notice this style seems to be a hit for others not just me. Not really pink but more peach, but goes with everything really.
Great color and extremely comfortable! I may buy more.
So soft, ordered one size larger than usual as I'll most likely layer this piece. Such a pretty color. Planning on using it to travel, planes can be so chilly. Only disappointment, no pockets.

I have several Everlane track sweatshirts, but this one is the softest-inside and out. I love the neutral Penguin color!! Full body fabric with sturdy zipper! Looking forward to “shorts and sweatshirts “ weather!! Washes and dries like a dream!!
I wish the weather was a tad cooler so I could wear this more often. It’s the perfect weight, it’s cozy, it’s soft, it’s the quintessential sweatshirt.
It’s soft and great quality! fits true to size. I order M and sometimes L for more cozy sweatshirts. Got this in a M, and it’s perfect!

name: The Supima® Micro-Rib Long-Sleeve Scoop-Neck
details: Your favorite tee, now in long sleeves. The Supima® Micro-Rib Long-Sleeve Scoop-Neck was such a fan-favorite, we’ve added a long sleeve style into the lineup. Made with our super-soft, fine-ribbed Supima® cotton® with a touch of stretch, it has a slim fit, with just a center-back seam. It’s the perfect layering piece or new favorite top.  Grown in the United States, Supima® cotton is distinguished by its extra-long fiber length, which gives it more durability and a softer hand feel. Supima® is able to authenticate the source of its cotton across the entire supply chain, from the fiber and yarn to the fabric and finished product.
review_description: Beautiful colour, soft and comfortable with a flattering fit.

Lovely essential piece to wear when you want to wear something more flattering than a crewneck. It's nice to wear throughout fall as a base layer when temperatures are still freezing, and it will be lovely in spring before it gets sweltering. Does'nt feel as soft as my crewneck pima cotton long sleeve out of the box, but softened nicely once I washed it.
Fits perfectly. I have in the pink, heather, white and black. Love them!
Nice fit and fabric but it could have been a bit thicker

name: The TENCEL™ Oversized Blazer
details:
Looking good has never been easier.   Our best-selling blazer reworked in a TENCEL™ Lyocell and cotton blend. Our Oversized Blazer has a roomy, menswear-inspired shape and modern look—complete with cuff buttons and flap pockets that add the perfect amount of polish. Complete the look with The Way-High Slouch Pant or over denim for a polished, casual look.   

Known for its lightness and versatility, TENCEL™ Lyocell is a man-made cellulosic fiber extracted from PEFC and FSC-certified responsible wood sources. It offers the same exceptional softness as conventional cotton while using less energy and water in the production process.
fabric: Shell: 60% TENCEL™ Lyocell, 40% Cotton; Lining: 100% Recycled Polyester
review_description: I looked at this blazer for ages. After receiving it, I wondered why I had been on the fence for so long. The fit is perfection. Overall the workmanship is impeccable, and wearing the blazer instantly elevates anything I’m wearing. I did size down for a more fitted look. Well done Everlane!
Smart, tailored fit. Beautifully made. Retro look, yet modern at the same time.

I've been looking for an oversize blazer for a while and this one is so simple and elegant yet unique with the peach hue. It runs true to size given the oversized nature of the product, but it fit well in shoulders and sleeves.
I saw fashion influencer Emily Wheatley wearing it on YouTube. She belted it & it looked terrific. Lots of ways to style it & it always looks and feels terrific.
Love the fabric, cut and quality of this blazer! Super comfortable and  perfect for work!

I love how this blazer gives a slightly oversized look, yet does not look sloppy!  I took my usual Everlane size and it fits wonderfully.  The sleeves are on the shorter side, but I tend to push my sleeves up anyway.  The fabric is strong, yet not stiff.  I own this blazer in 2 other colours.  It is just so well made and fits beautifully.

This is my third Everlane Oversized Blazer and it's fantastic! I bought this with the matching black Tencel™ Way-High® Taper Pant and it will be in my wardrobe for years. It is an off-black color and the sleeve length is perfect on me (usually sleeves are too long on me so I can see how the sleeves might be too short for some people or how it is shown in the model picture). I'm usually a 00 with Everlane outerwear but an xsmall for other Everlane tops. I love that I can dress this up or down easily. It will probably be my next interview outfit and then I can go out that night wearing it! The fabric does seem pretty delicate... mine was shipped with a small part of the fabric "tugged out" around the neck (very small and behind my hair so not noticeable at all). It did have an orange sticker on the tag (meaning it was returned once) so I wish it did not have that fabric piece "tugged out" but that is just me being very picky because it's very small.
Comfortable blazer, flattering and nice fit. I had to size down for it to fit right on me. But looks great and a great shape despite being oversized.

name: The Organic Cotton Crew Tee
details: A true gamine classic. The Organic Cotton Crew features a boyish cut with a slim, feminine fit. Plus, it’s made of lightweight organic cotton, which makes it ultra-breathable and soft to the touch. Go on—revamp your basics.
review_description: Soft, comfy, and well fitting tee shirts. These launder very well
Nice fit and soft! Runs true to size. The color is pretty and true to what is shown on the site.
The fit was perfect for me …I’m a petite (bust)
I don’t feel “lost” in my shirt —
I mainly wear inside with a lounge pant/outside for a bike ride—
I love the fabric …soft and the grey color it’s a bright grey—
Best basic T out there.
also super soft and not see through!

I’m  a t-shirt snob. My favorite? Everlane! The fit is perfection with just enough to tuck without extra fabric. Weight is not too heavy, not too thick, great for layer—and it feels so luxe! The description summarizes my thought perfectly—boyish cut with feminine fit. Love all the colors!
The shirt is comfortable, well made, and attractive. I actually have a couple.
Live this tee shirt. Feels so soft and comfortable and washed beautifully.
Own it in all the basic colors plus two whites and blacks.
This tee can be dressed up or down. Soft feel and flattering slim fit. It holds its shape with washes and does not get saggy.

name: The Organic Cotton Box-Cut Tee
details:
It’s an icon. The Organic Cotton Box-Cut Tee features a classic crew neckline, easy short sleeves, a slightly cropped length, and a relaxed fit for a truly timeless look. Plus, it’s made of 100%, organic cotton which makes it super breathable and soft to the touch. 

Organic cotton uses crop rotation, cover crops, and organic fertilizers instead of toxic chemical fertilizers or pesticides—which means cleaner water, lower water usage, lower pesticide use, healthier soil, and a safer working environment for cotton farmers, compared to conventional cotton.
review_description: I’ve been shopping around for a great tee, and this one ticks all the boxes. Soft with a great shape makes it the perfect versatile t-shirt.
Just wish Everlane would resume providing the exact long sleeve version, as well as in a heavier weight material.  More blue colors, please.
Comfortable fit and keeps it shape. The black and white tees seem to be of better quality than the other colors however.
Not easy to find the perfect box tee , but here it is!
I am a fan of Everlane! Quality material,design,color and fit.Never disappointed

This is the perfect basic tee for any outfit. I got it in 3 colors and I seriously live in them now! The perfect length to be casual or dressier. They are also a really soft material. I got a size M and I usually could go either way with a M or L because of my bust. However a medium fits perfect and doesn’t feel oversized or snug. If you want them to be a bit baggier, size up!
I love these tees! They are the perfect weight, the perfect length (I’m on the short side), and perfect boxiness that I was looking for. I’m 5’2”, 122 lbs and the S fit well.

I wear medium in most Everlane tees, but sized way down to XS in this tee and it’s the *perfect* baby tee. Slightly cropped, the sleeves aren’t too tight, fitted around the bust and loose around the tummy. Just perfect

name: The Way-High® Drape Pant
details: Our signature way-high cut—now in a drapey fabric. The Way-High® Drape Pant features an extra-high rise, two handy side pockets, a flattering pleat design, and a wide-leg cut. Plus, it gets its drape from our breathable, lightweight fabric that’s soft to the touch.
review_description: These pants are soft and the material feels like good quality. They are long (will probably need to be hemmed for shorter women) and they fit true to size. If between sizes, i’d suggest going with your smaller size.

I have been eyeing the way drape pant for quite a long time. One day I stepped into the store and tried them on. The fit was great, but I wasn’t really sure about the ash brown color. I took a chance and lo and behold over the past few weeks these have been my go-to pair of pants, so much so that I am already considering buying the same pair in the sandstone. A quick note on fit. While I am technically petite-5’1” and shrinking, lol-I have long legs and a short waist. As a result, I found the length to be pretty perfect on me. I can even wear sneakers with these pants!
Fantastic, outstanding, perfect trousers. I’m 5’9” with a 27”

waist and 39” hips, and the size 4R is a dream fit. (In fact, they’re *almost* too long, which is something I never thought I’d say about a pair of Everlane pants.) I’m incredibly pleased with the quality, too—the fabric is heavy enough to drape nicely, and it doesn’t seem to wrinkle badly. I bought the navy blue pinstripe colorway, and I get compliments every single time. So pleased!

As I’m only 5’4” I had to have these hemmed one turn. To say they’re stylish but extremely comfortable seems too much of an understatement. If I could get away with it, I would wear them every day. So glad I took the chance and bought them. I bought my regular size 4 and they fit beautifully.
I love these pants!  Great fit and if you are tall the length is long enough to drape.  The material has body and the colour a true navy.

I'm so happy for this trend, we have been waiting for PANTS and these remind me of city dressing in the 90s when I lived in NYC and London. I also have super long legs and being able to wear pants that actually go onto my shoes is heaven.
Just a personal preference I would love the tiniest bit more give in the waist.
Really nice pants - I love the weight of the fabric. They are a little lighter in color than I expected. The fit really nice too.

Love these pants. High waisted perfection. Pants sit just above the belly button, so perfect for cropped shirts. Also great with tucked in shirts, sweaters or whatever. Soft, comfortable fabric that holds shape and doesn’t wrinkle. Perfect length - slight drag with flats and perfect with 2-3 inch heels. I’m 5’7” 155lbs and size 8 fits perfect with plenty of breathing room.

name: The Original Cheeky® Jean
details:
Our best-selling Original Cheeky® Jean—upgraded for the perfect fit. We updated this with an even higher rise, a straighter leg, and a raised back-hook seam that lifts and tightens. Plus, it features our signature Happy Pockets, which are set higher and closer together for a bouncy, lifted look. Even better? It’s made of our cleanest denim fabric yet.*

*This jean is made of organic cotton and Roica® V550 yarn—i.e., the first stretch yarn worldwide that isn’t made with harmful chemicals. This innovative fabric, along with the use of microplastic-free dyes and recycled trim, has allowed us to be one of the first companies to make denim that doesn’t dirty the planet. Learn more here.
fabric: 98% Organic Cotton, 2% Elastane. This premium 13 oz denim has an authentic feel with a touch of stretch.
review_description: Love these jeans! They fit my waist and hips perfectly and are long enough for my height 😊
These jeans are great, they fit so well, don’t flatten your behind and are the perfect length!
These are my favorite jeans! One of the best pairs I’ve ever had

I absolutely love Everlane jeans!! They live up to the hype with their amazing quality and durability. These are my second pair of Everlane jeans and I’m in love with the fit. It’s high waisted so I feel like it holds everything in place (long torso, big butt lol). These jeans will probably last me a long time.

These jeans are super comfortable, the perfect amount of stretch and I love the fit. They come just above my ankles and I’m 5’4”. Ordered size 27 (135 lbs) in the ankle length and these run true to size. These are my second pair in the original cheeky jeans and I get so much wear out of them.
Fit is perfect for me, and the quality never disappoints. Cotton is natural and feels great on the skin.
Perfect fit and length.
Size 8/29 the shortest length. 5’3” 145
THESE. These jeans are IT!

I’m a 30 year old mom of 3 in 3 years so more softness, less perk in the body arena. These jeans flatten and support my tummy, snatch my waist and inner thigh, and smooth out all the extra love in my curves. My favorite thing though? The BOOTY! It’s the best I’ve looked in a pair of jeans even before kids! I love my body the way it is and WOWZA these jeans just amp it up a notch!

I’m 5’5, fluctuating anywhere from 132-140 pounds. I ordered a 26 which is my normal size. When I’m on the lower end of my weight range, these jeans fit perfectly. On the higher end, there really isn’t a ton of stretch so I could to with a size up as it feels too tight in my tummy.

Length: I have both the shortest length and the middle “average” length. I wore my shortest length with a pair of ankle booties and hiking socks and there was still a significant portion of sock showing which for me was too much. Id say if you are my height and wanting a casual summer jean with sandals, you can do shortest length, otherwise I’d go for the middle one.
Love these jeans and can’t recommend enough!

name: The Way-High® Jean
details:
Say goodbye to your belly button.
Featuring our highest rise yet, the Way-High® Jean accentuates your true waist, gives you legs for days, and holds you in—in the best way possible. Plus, it's made of premium organic cotton with a touch of stretch, so sitting down isn’t a deal-breaker. 

Due to an extra high rise, we suggest sizing up if you prefer more ease around the waist.
review_description: Best straight leg ankle length dark jeans on the market.
The fit is always so good.  Great quality denim, I’m devoted to the brand!
I very much like this dark blue color. I’m 174sm 67 kg and have weight in mid section. The fit and overall look is owesome.

These are the jeans I have been searching for. Super comfortable, hugs you in where you want them to, and the straight leg falls just right to create a lovely line. I went down a size. Looking forward to buying other colours.
I want this in every color! Love the fit and look. Great quality and so comfy!!
Heavy denim but very flattering cut. I don’t recommend sizing up.

Gorgeous wide-leg jeans! The fit is perfect if you’re looking for very high-waisted (just under the ribcage) and have a medium to long-ish torso. The wide leg is just right- not comically wide but definitely more than a straight leg. As always with Everlane, the fabric is beautiful and substantial. They have just enough stretch to be comfortable while still feeling held in. The bone color is ideal for summer months all the way through winter. I did have to go up from my usual 31 to a 32 due to the high waist being a bit more pinched. I purchased the 27.5” length and they just brush the top of my sneakers.

Flattering, simple and casual, yet elegant. I love that Everlane’s clothes (these jeans and in general) are thoughtfully made with un-outsourced production. I’ve seriously considered donating *all* my old clothes and buying the rest of my outfits exclusively from Everlane 😍. Just need to win the lottery first 💸!!
(Also, side note, I’m in love with the fact that no matter the gendered section, the clothes are relatively androgynous - very meaningful for a nonbinary person like myself 🖤)

name: The ’90s Cheeky® Jean
details:
Our favorite jean meets our favorite decade.
Made from premium non-stretch Japanese denim for a vintage-inspired look, the ’90s Cheeky® Jean has an easy straight leg, an extra-high rise, and a butt-boosting rear fit. Need a smaller waist? This style's also available in curvy.
review_description: Love the length, the color and the fit. I got size 27  - I am usually a 6 and these were perfect. The sales associate was so helpful and told me to size down which was the right move. I just love where they hit on the waist and at the ankle (I'm 5'4").
Great fit, thick material, straight leg, slight high rise.

I usually size down in Everlane but these jeans I bought my standard size, and they are very tight. They look amazing but I might have sized up one if I’d known. However, amazing quality and amazing on the butt! Love them. I just hope they’ll stretch out a little.
I love love love these jeans, they’re so cute and I’ve gotten so many compliments on them. I wish they restock them so I can get them in other washes
Flattering fit; substantive, soft fabric; greatest color! LOVE.
I wish I bought shorter version but still like it.
plan to buy shorter version in other color.

I’m petite and am always looking for jeans that are well made and stylish for petite figures. This is challenging most of the time. So, I was not expecting much. But I was pleasantly surprised to see the nice fit of these jeans. They are not overly large at the waist despite my larger size and the length is great. Everlane fabric.quality is unmatched.
My favorite jeans of all! I own them in 5 washes. The white ones are so nice and perfect for Summer. They are even softer and a bit thinner than other washes. Comfortable right out of the bag. Love!

name: The Way-High® Sailor Jean
details:
Hey there, sailor.
The Way-High® Sailor Jean features our signature Way-High® waist, a 29.5” inseam with an A-line, wide-leg silhouette in low stretch denim so you don't have to worry about these pants losing their shape. Your lower half will thank you. The best part? It’s made of premium organic cotton.

Style runs small, we suggest sizing up.
review_description: These jeans are my favorite thing Everlane has ever done! The denim is quality - rigid yet soft. The length is great. I can wear these with clogs, sandals, slides and boots (I have done all of the above). I get so many compliments when I wear them. I'm 5'5" 110 Lbs with a slender build and the 24 fits great (I  wanted a tighter fit for these so sized down). Normally I am a 25 but I don't feel restricted in these since the rise is so high and the crotch length longer than what I've had in the past. I turned my best friend on to these and she purchased her regular size 26 and they fit like a glove so I recommend purchasing your true Everlane size. Thank you Everlane!!!
Perfect wide leg no stretch jean. Has a bit of a waist gap but easy tailoring.
The most comfortable, the most flattering, the most elegant, the most versatile.

The cutest coziest stylish jeans. I really hate tight fitting uncomfortable clothes so these fit the bill in terms of being able to do anything in them even days I’m nannying and walking the dog or going out to dinner . 10/10 omg
I love these jeans! They make me feel so put together, and have the best shape. I can’t wait to get another pair!
Perfect waist and lovely cut. Comfortable yet supportive and I wish I had more washes.
These jeans are so comfy and flattering. I just ordered my second pair in ecru. These will be my go-to for fall.

I was ecstatic to see these sailor jeans with the longer inseam. I have worn my old pair with the 27" inseam so often, and love them. But I'm 5'9" and they hit me a bit higher than I like wearing shoes/sandals (they're my faves to wear with cowboy boots). I am so happy with the 29.5 inseam. These jeans are PERFECT. So flattering.

name: The TENCEL™ Way-High® Taper Pant
details:
A tailored look. Our Way-High family is growing. Featuring a tapered leg, ankle length, The Way-High® Taper Pant has a non-stretch waistband (we suggest sizing up if you prefer more ease here), an extra-high rise, two side pockets, and a flattering pleat detail. Complete the look with The Oversized Blazer. Talk about a tailored look.

Known for its lightness and versatility, TENCEL™ Lyocell is a man-made cellulosic fiber extracted from PEFC and FSC-certified responsible wood sources. It offers the same exceptional softness as conventional cotton while using less energy and water in the production process.
review_description: For me, it’s hard to find pants that are both comfortable and professional, but these pants make it easy. Seriously my favorite work pants. They’re even great for my pear shape, I suppose because of the pleats. Because it’s curvy-friendly, I’d recommend sizing down by one (it’s what I did).

I’m in love with these pants. I bought a size 6 because I wanted a bit of room in the waist and I’m very happy (for reference I’m a 28-29” waist and 39” hip). The length is also perfect for me. The fit is great and they look amazing. I probably could have gone with a size 4 also if I wanted them more fitted. Can be dressed up or down and are super comfortable! I’m fully on the pleated, taper pant train. Please make these in more colours!! A charcoal would be amazing.

Very flattering to those of us with wider hips and smaller waists.  Fabric didn’t wrinkle after wearing them all day, although the waist loosened a bit.  I’ll wear a belt with them next time I wear them.  I love them though and want other colors!!
Great lighter weight fabric, perfect for transition from summer to fall and can be dressed up or down. Love the high waist fit and modern pleating.

These fit a little more tightly in the waist band than my tried and true utility barrel (so size up one), but I'm obsessed. I feel cool, put together, and I'm comfortable. Instantly elevates any work outfit.

I love the combo of how high waisted these pants are with the tapered leg. It gives them that different factor and feels a bit dressed up even though they’re really easy to wear. And they’re sooo soft. I sized down.
I’m 5’5” (110 lbs) and these hit just around my ankle. The 00 fit perfectly. I purchased the black and I wish they came in many other neutral solid colors like olive or a dark tan/brown.

I love these pants! Great cut and fabric quality. I don't usually wear pleated pants because they accentuate the widest part of my hips, but the stripes counteract that effect. The waist is high and snug, but I don't mind that.

name: The Corduroy Wide-Leg Workpant
details: Workwear but add cords. If you love the Gardener Jean you’ll be an instant fan of the Corduroy Wide-Leg Workpant. Taking the same high-rise silhouette as the jean version, these wide-leg pants feature extra large functional pockets that wrap around from front to back, utility style stitching, a zipper fly, and a cropped length. Oh, and did we mention, it’s made with our velvety-soft corduroy, for an elevated edge.

name: The Good Merino Wool Mockneck Sweater
details:
Good on you, better for the planet.  Inspired by vintage wool sweaters, this timeless style features a cropped, boxy fit and a relaxed feel with ribbed detailing, exposed seam embellishment down the sleeves, and a seamless mockneck for a clean, sophisticated look. Made from a blend of 92% ZQRX™ wool and 8% ZQ™ wool, which we aptly named Good Wool, it’s a heritage staple that keeps on giving—to you and the environment.  

Our Good Wool is certified to both the ZQ standard, and to the Responsible Wool Standard (RWS), which ensures growers follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare and develop in-depth environmental management plans. ZQRX™ wool is part of a particularly exclusive subset of responsible wool where over 500 wool growers are committed to continuous improvement beyond sustainability through regenerative agriculture. Grown using regenerative farming principles on over 4 million acres of land, ZQRX™ wool cuts down on carbon emissions while supporting soil regeneration and building a positive future for Merino farming.
fabric: 100% Wool (92% ZQRX™ Regenerative, 8% ZQ™) Trimming: 93% Wool, 6% Nylon, 1% Elastane

name: The Utility Barrel Pant
details: The shape of things to come. Made of lightweight cotton twill with just a touch of stretch, the Utility Barrel Pant is complete with a waist-nipping high rise, a cool curved leg, and an easy cropped length. Plus, it has utilitarian details, like accent stitching and patch pockets for a craftsman-inspired look.
review_description: Love these pants! Was nervous about my fit at first as these are my first pair of everlane pants but they fit great! Fit is slightly wide and not super form-fitting on the thigh and slightly narrows as you go down.
Great fit and quality. This item made me fall in love with Everlane ♥️

I have a really hard time finding pants that fit me through the hips and thighs, as well as the waist. It's as though these were made for me. They're comfortable and very stylish. I got them in three different colors, too.
Most comfortable pants ever. And they look good too!
The fit and fabric of these barrel pants is so great!  They are incredibly comfortable. The high waist is flattering and the looser leg is comfortable. I have two pair!

I literally never write reviews about things but I love these pants so much. They are COMFY and cute. Perfect in the waist and not tight around the hips, etc. Plus the details...the button, the horizontal stripes around the belt, the soft fabric, these are maybe my favorite pants ever.

I wear these pants to work on a weekly basis, summer and winter! So comfy, and perfect for the curvy people with small waist/big hips combo. Usually I’m a size 28 or 6, but since these are curvy-friendly, the size 4 was perfect.

Honestly, I was not expecting to love these pants as much as I did! From the moment I put them on, I was hooked. The material is nice and stretchy, making them feel like you are wearing sweatpants, but looking more dressed up. I with they made more colors in the Tall version, but maybe soon! I will definitely be buying another pair if they do.

name: The Dream Pant®
details: Tailored look, sweatpant feel. Made of soft double-knit fabric, the Dream Pant® features an elastic waist, pintuck detailing, and a sleek tapered leg. Plus, it has a flat finish, so it looks polished, but it’s comfortable enough to nap in. The best part? It’s wrinkle resistant. From morning meetings to afternoon errands to late-night lounging—this pant looks (and feels) like a dream.
review_description: THese are so comfy and I love the drawstring in the waist.  I have wide hips and smaller waist and most "off the rack" pants don't fit me well.  The only thing is if I tie the waist too tight the waistband turns up a bit.  I'm 5'7" and I love the length.  These are probably a little heavy for summer time, but perfect for fall.  Great quality.

These are the most comfortable pants for work. They look nice and professional and are perfect for the fall and winter as they are pretty warm. I typically put my nicer office clothes in the dryer for 10-15 minutes to get the wrinkles out before I hang them to dry and I did that with these pants and they shrank significantly which is a big bummer. So definitely don’t put them in the dryer AT ALL.
I'd live in sweats all year if I could. These give me the comfort of that while still looking polished. I have 2 colors. They are so comfy. Much appreciated 🙏🏾

These are by far my fave work pants. They are so comfy, I look forward to wearing them, yet they look polished so I feel professional and put together. I can wear them with blouses or sweaters, were them business casual or dressy. They work with heels or flat. I am going to try the wide leg next.

I bought the regular and wide Dream Pants. I love them both. For reference I am 5’2” about 107-110 lbs. I purchased  the XS in both styles. I tried the XXS in both but they felt too tight in the waist and bum areas. XS felt more comfortable for me.

The pants falling so high above my ankles is the only thing that detracts from an otherwise good look. These are the comfiest sweatpants I’ve found that look polished and the green might be my favorite color for them, if not the black. If only they were longer!

Hard truth:  I'm picky, persnickety, and particular.  I purchased these pants for travel hoping to find a comfortable but polished look that wouldn't scream, "AMERICAN TOURIST IN EUROPE".  Frankly they just sounded too good to be true.  But, I purchased them when they went on sale and hoped for the best.  And, boom!  They are awesome.  Comfy, sleek, polished enough to dress up when needed.  I admit to being slightly bummed that the waist was too big...right up until I discovered the handy dandy drawstring on the inside.  So, yes...they are perfect and you should quit reading reviews and just get a pair!
These pants look professional and are also VERY comfy.

name: The Cashmere Classic Crew Sweater
details:
A lightweight, luxurious layer. We reimagined our classic Cashmere Crew in a new sustainable blend of recycled and virgin cashmere. With an updated fit in the neckline so it sits closer to the body, more delicate trims, and smoother openings on the bottom for an easy, timeless look—this layer will get softer with each wear.  Luxury—reimagined. 

We created a unique blend of GRS-certified recycled cashmere and Good Cashmere Standard®-certified cashmere to give you all the beauty of traditional cashmere with a lower environmental footprint.  On one side, using recycled cashmere can lower the raw material carbon emissions of our garments by over 90%, when compared to virgin cashmere. On the other side, sourcing cashmere—certified through The Good Cashmere Standard® by AbTF—guarantees the welfare of cashmere goats, protects the natural resources where they graze, and improves the working conditions of cashmere farmers. It’s the best of both worlds.
fabric: Body/Neck Opening: 100% Cashmere (50% Recycled) Cuffs: 95% Cashmere (50% Recycled) 1% Elastane 4% Other Fiber Bottom: 90% Cashmere (50% Recycled) 9% Nylon 1% Elastane
review_description: Fit was perfect,  I'm a pretty solid medium with wider shoulders and a decent 34DD bust.  I've gotten so many compliments...
I have several of these sweaters and was san when they seemed to be no longer part of your line. Delighted to add this one to my cool weather collection.

name: The Alpaca Cropped Crewneck Sweater
details:
This is a crew you want to be in.  Made from a blend of RAS-certified alpaca, GRS-certified recycled nylon, and RWS- certified responsible merino wool, this classic crew features a slightly cropped, relaxed fit with ribbed detailing. We love it with denim and loafers for a timeless look.  
Our Responsible Alpaca garments are certified to the Responsible Alpaca Standard (RAS), which sets requirements for third-party certification to ensure that alpaca fiber comes from farms that manage their land with a progressive approach, practice holistic respect for the alpaca, and follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare. Full visibility throughout the supply chain, from farm to final garment manufacturer, is needed to pass certification standards. (Fun Fact: After joining the Textile Exchange’s working group to help develop the standard, Everlane became an RAS-certified brand in 2022 and is one of the first brands to be certified.)
fabric: 60% Alpaca, 30% Nylon (21% Recycled), 10% Merino Wool Exclusive of Trimming

name: The Good Merino Wool Crewneck Sweater
details:
Good on you, better for the planet.  Inspired by vintage wool sweaters, this soft crew offers a cropped, boxy fit with a relaxed feel, ribbed detailing, and an exposed seam embellishment down the sleeves. Made from a blend of 92% ZQRX™ wool and 8% ZQ™ wool, which we aptly named Good Wool, it’s a heritage classic that keeps on giving—to you and the environment.  Pro Tip: Size down for a more snug fit.  

Our Good Wool is certified to both the ZQ standard, and to the Responsible Wool Standard (RWS), which ensures growers follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare and develop in-depth environmental management plans. ZQRX™ wool is part of a particularly exclusive subset of responsible wool where over 500 wool growers are committed to continuous improvement beyond sustainability through regenerative agriculture. Grown using regenerative farming principles on over 4 million acres of land, ZQRX™ wool cuts down on carbon emissions while supporting soil regeneration and building a positive future for Merino farming.
fabric: 100% Wool (92% ZQRX™ Regenerative, 8% ZQ™) Trimming: 93% Wool, 6% Nylon, 1% Elastane

name: The Felted Merino Funnel-Neck Pullover
details:
The new neckline. Your new cozy staple, the Felted Merino Funnel-Neck Pullover features an oversized and boxy fit in a chunky rib stitch, with dropped shoulders and straight sleeves that have a wider opening. A seamless funnel neck and traveling rib stitch detailing at the shoulder seam adds to its contemporary clean silhouette. It’s made with our best-selling, soft-as-anything, responsibly-sourced felted merino yarn. 

The Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) sets requirements for third-party certification to ensure that wool comes from farms that manage their land with a progressive approach, practice holistic respect for the sheep, and follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare. The standard also maintains a strong chain of custody for certified materials as they move through the supply chain to guarantee visibility, protect soil health, biodiversity, and native species on all RWS farms, as well as adhere to strict social welfare practices for the health and safety of workers.

name: The Ribbed Wrap Midi Dress
details:
For versatile style.   A relaxed wraparound silhouette with a tie-waist for adjustable styling, The Ribbed Wrap Midi Dress is the perfect blend of comfort and polished style. Featuring dropped shoulders and wide, cropped sleeves which hit just below the elbow, its midi length keeps it oh-so effortless no matter how you choose to style it. Made with 65% viscose and 35% recycled nylon for just enough stretch, it’s finished in a refined ribbed texture.  

 The viscose in this garment comes from an FSC-certified supplier who has been audited and assessed as being at low risk, or has taken substantive action to eliminate known risk of sourcing rayon and viscose from ancient and endangered forests by CanopyStyle.
review_description: This is super cute and well made. The sleeves are very voluminous so keep that in mind. I got this dressed hemmed to be above the knee so could show more leg but still feel covered.
This dress is lovely! It fits true to size & the material is thick & feels luxurious. This was my first Everlane purchase & I’m extremely happy with it.
Perfect for so many occasions. I wore to a wedding with pumps. Also can dress down with casual boots.
I love this dress I am going to order it in another color. Size runs a little big I got a XL and the arms are big.

name: The Ribbed Scoopneck Dress
details:
Here’s the scoop on your new go-to dress.  The perfect piece for any occasion. Made from a blend of FSC-certified viscose and recycled nylon, this effortless essential features a scooped neckline, slim-fit sleeves, flattering stitch detail, and a fitted bodice that flares out with a little volume in the skirt. Dress it up with heels and your favorite jewelry, or keep it casual with sneakers.  

The viscose in this garment comes from a supplier who was awarded a Dark Green Shirt designation by CanopyStyle, indicating that they have been audited and assessed as being at low risk, or has taken substantive action to eliminate known risk of sourcing rayon and viscose from Ancient and Endangered Forests. The recycled nylon in this garment is GRS-certified. The Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions—with the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production.

name: The Felted Merino Half-Zip Sweater
details:
Relaxed yet refined, in the best way possible. Featuring an elevated zip neckline, a soft ribbed knit, and a relaxed fit, the Felted Merino Half-Zip Sweater has a luxe look and cozy feel. The best part? It’s made of extra-fine merino wool that’s been washed and boiled for a softer, warmer, and more durable feel.

This merino wool is certified by the Responsible Wool Standard, ensuring the welfare of the sheep and the land they graze on.
fabric: Body: 100% Wool, Trimming: 96% Wool, 1% Elastane, 3% Other Fiber.
review_description: I bought the merino wool half zip sweater in black.   I loved it so much I bought it again in the winter white color!   So cozy, comfortable and warm.
I’m 5’3” and the small was perfect!  I highly recommend!
Oversized, comfy fit. Hits right at the waist. Love the color!
This sweater is so comfortable! It’s my favorite and go to on cooler days. It is a great layering piece and so versatile. It’s a staple!

I checked the body and garment dimensions and it runs very oversized. This looks great on younger women but not me. I usually wear a L, sometimes an XL. I bought the M and it is perfect! I got the camel color which is a nice neutral with all my clothes, the zipper and the collar add a bit of style to a sweater. It feels soft and the length is perfect, hits my hips. I can't report on how it washes and wears as I haven't been able to wear it that much yet.

I absolutely love this sweater! They only had a small left and I’m always between a small and medium and I’m glad I sized down a bit. It doesn’t fit me as slouchy as the model shows which I like better. The length is perfect and there’s still room in the arms. Tempted to give this a 4 star because I didn’t realize this was dry clean only but really the sweater is great so it’s worth it for a good find!
Knits from Everlane never fail, and this doesn’t disappoint either. It’s so cozy and looks great French tuck style. I’m sure I will wear it for years, just like my other Everlane sweaters.

This half-zip meets and exceeds all expectations! I was on the fence for several months, but I’m so happy I finally pulled the trigger. The quality is superb. It is dry-clean only, FYI. Can’t wait for cooler weather!

I am a fan of EVERLANE but as a woman who is petite, 5'2" I cannot often where your fashions. This sweater however was perfect for me and the perfect weight. I loved the full sleeve and the zipper made for wearing the collar up or down. Love. PLEASE make Petites in pants. PLEASE! The shorter inseam does not do it, it's not about the length, it's about the RISE!

name: The Cashmere Boxy Crew Sweater
details:
50% recycled cashmere, 50% virgin cashmere, 100% quiet luxury.  Our classic boxy fit—slightly cropped with ribbed detailing—now in an updated blend of GRS-certified recycled cashmere and GCS-certified responsible cashmere, so you can wear this timeless staple on repeat for years and years.  

Fun Fact: We created a unique blend of GRS-certified recycled cashmere and Good Cashmere Standard®-certified cashmere to give you all the beauty of traditional cashmere with a lower environmental footprint. On one side, using recycled cashmere can lower the raw material carbon emissions of our garments by over 90%, when compared to virgin cashmere. On the other side, sourcing responsible cashmere—certified through The Good Cashmere Standard® by AbTF—ensures the welfare of cashmere goats, protects the natural resources where they graze, and improves the working conditions of cashmere farmers. It’s the best of both worlds.
fabric: Body: 100% Cashmere (50% Recycled) Trimming: 94% Cashmere (50% Recycled), 5% Nylon, 1% Elastane

name: The Way-High® Jean
details:
Say goodbye to your belly button.
Featuring our highest rise yet, the Way-High® Jean accentuates your true waist, gives you legs for days, and holds you in—in the best way possible. Plus, it's made of premium organic cotton with a touch of stretch, so sitting down isn’t a deal-breaker. 

Due to an extra high rise, we suggest sizing up if you prefer more ease around the waist.
review_description: Best straight leg ankle length dark jeans on the market.
The fit is always so good.  Great quality denim, I’m devoted to the brand!
I very much like this dark blue color. I’m 174sm 67 kg and have weight in mid section. The fit and overall look is owesome.

These are the jeans I have been searching for. Super comfortable, hugs you in where you want them to, and the straight leg falls just right to create a lovely line. I went down a size. Looking forward to buying other colours.
I want this in every color! Love the fit and look. Great quality and so comfy!!
Heavy denim but very flattering cut. I don’t recommend sizing up.

Gorgeous wide-leg jeans! The fit is perfect if you’re looking for very high-waisted (just under the ribcage) and have a medium to long-ish torso. The wide leg is just right- not comically wide but definitely more than a straight leg. As always with Everlane, the fabric is beautiful and substantial. They have just enough stretch to be comfortable while still feeling held in. The bone color is ideal for summer months all the way through winter. I did have to go up from my usual 31 to a 32 due to the high waist being a bit more pinched. I purchased the 27.5” length and they just brush the top of my sneakers.

Flattering, simple and casual, yet elegant. I love that Everlane’s clothes (these jeans and in general) are thoughtfully made with un-outsourced production. I’ve seriously considered donating *all* my old clothes and buying the rest of my outfits exclusively from Everlane 😍. Just need to win the lottery first 💸!!
(Also, side note, I’m in love with the fact that no matter the gendered section, the clothes are relatively androgynous - very meaningful for a nonbinary person like myself 🖤)

name: The Cotton-Merino Turtleneck Dress
details:
Turtleneck, but make it a dress. Turtleneck meets dress in this relaxed midi-length dress. The Cotton-Merino Turtleneck Dress features a column-like fit, gentle dropped shoulders and a folded turtleneck in an all-over rib stitch. Made with a blend of RWS-certified merino wool and organic cotton. 

The Responsible Wool Standard (RWS) sets requirements for third-party certification to ensure that wool comes from farms that manage their land with a progressive approach, practice holistic respect for the sheep, and follow the Five Freedoms of animal welfare. The standard also maintains a strong chain of custody for certified materials as they move through the supply chain to guarantee visibility, protect soil health, biodiversity, and native species on all RWS farms, as well as adhere to strict social welfare practices for the health and safety of workers.
fabric: Body: 55% Wool, 45% Organic Cotton Collar: 48% Wool, 39% Organic Cotton, 11% Nylon, 2% Elastane

name: The Original Cheeky® Jean
details:
Our best-selling Original Cheeky® Jean—upgraded for the perfect fit. We updated this with an even higher rise, a straighter leg, and a raised back-hook seam that lifts and tightens. Plus, it features our signature Happy Pockets, which are set higher and closer together for a bouncy, lifted look. Even better? It’s made of our cleanest denim fabric yet.*

*This jean is made of organic cotton and Roica® V550 yarn—i.e., the first stretch yarn worldwide that isn’t made with harmful chemicals. This innovative fabric, along with the use of microplastic-free dyes and recycled trim, has allowed us to be one of the first companies to make denim that doesn’t dirty the planet. Learn more here.
fabric: 96% Organic Cotton, 1% Elastane, 3% Other Fibers. This premium 13 oz denim has an authentic feel with a touch of stretch.
review_description: Love these jeans! They fit my waist and hips perfectly and are long enough for my height 😊
These jeans are great, they fit so well, don’t flatten your behind and are the perfect length!
These are my favorite jeans! One of the best pairs I’ve ever had

I absolutely love Everlane jeans!! They live up to the hype with their amazing quality and durability. These are my second pair of Everlane jeans and I’m in love with the fit. It’s high waisted so I feel like it holds everything in place (long torso, big butt lol). These jeans will probably last me a long time.

These jeans are super comfortable, the perfect amount of stretch and I love the fit. They come just above my ankles and I’m 5’4”. Ordered size 27 (135 lbs) in the ankle length and these run true to size. These are my second pair in the original cheeky jeans and I get so much wear out of them.
Fit is perfect for me, and the quality never disappoints. Cotton is natural and feels great on the skin.
Perfect fit and length.
Size 8/29 the shortest length. 5’3” 145
THESE. These jeans are IT!

I’m a 30 year old mom of 3 in 3 years so more softness, less perk in the body arena. These jeans flatten and support my tummy, snatch my waist and inner thigh, and smooth out all the extra love in my curves. My favorite thing though? The BOOTY! It’s the best I’ve looked in a pair of jeans even before kids! I love my body the way it is and WOWZA these jeans just amp it up a notch!

I’m 5’5, fluctuating anywhere from 132-140 pounds. I ordered a 26 which is my normal size. When I’m on the lower end of my weight range, these jeans fit perfectly. On the higher end, there really isn’t a ton of stretch so I could to with a size up as it feels too tight in my tummy.

Length: I have both the shortest length and the middle “average” length. I wore my shortest length with a pair of ankle booties and hiking socks and there was still a significant portion of sock showing which for me was too much. Id say if you are my height and wanting a casual summer jean with sandals, you can do shortest length, otherwise I’d go for the middle one.
Love these jeans and can’t recommend enough!

name: The Italian Wool Oversized Blazer
details: Borrowing from the boys never looked so good. Our Oversized Blazer has a roomy, menswear-inspired shape and modern look—complete with cuff buttons, flap pockets, and recycled shoulder pads that add the perfect amount of polish. Plus, it’s made with recycled Italian wool, which gives it a visual drape and tangible warmth.
fabric: Shell: 65% Recycled Wool, 30% Recycled Nylon, 5% Other Fibers Sleeve Lining: 100% Polyester
review_description: Love this blazer. I wanted an oversized tweed style blazer for years and finally settled on this one. It fits great & also works as a cute fall jacket.

I was far too stressed finding the proper size for this blazer. For reference, in Lululemon tops I am a 4 or 6, and 4 in their bottoms. I originally ordered size 0 in this blazer and was nervous it was going to be too small... When I tried it on though, it was giving "Gru from Despicable Me" vibes. Not cute! I ordered a 00 and that fit better, returned the 0.
I love the craftsmanship and weight of the material on this blazer. It’s been perfect for three seasons of the year. Even when I sized down it still had a pretty oversized fit.
This blazer is so very chic and a classic. Received many compliments. Can you tell I love, love, love it.  Not only beautiful but beautifully made.
The different colors go well with each other and are comfortable to wear.
I bought one size smaller. The blazer is stylish and practical.
Love the boxy fit - soft texture and love the color

Pleased with this soft drapey black/cream blazer. Not to heavy. Not cheap/flimsy. Lined and well made. Just-as-advertised modern oversize but not sloppy in my standard size. (Please don't size down expecting a tailored fit - its not made that way. This isn't just a too big tailored jacket.) Absolutely perfect for dressing up or down 300 days of the year. I have several costly wool blazers and now this is my favorite as nothing is softer while looking like a quality piece. I imagine if I was lucky enough to own a blazer from a Wallstreet great grandfather I didn't know I had... it would be like this.

name: The Re:Down® Puffer
details:
Perfectly puffed.  Stay snug with the Re:Down® Puffer. Featuring a center-front two-way zipper with double zipper pulls, plus on-seam pockets with internal snap closures, it has internal drawstrings at the hem for adjustability. Puffed-up for warmth, it’s filled with recycled down feathers, while the jacket is made with our recycled GRS-certified and bluesign approved nylon and lined with recycled polyester. 

Re:Down® repurposes feathers and down from pillows, comforters, and sleeping bags to give you luxurious softness that’s 100% warm, 100% natural, and 100% recycled. With the goal of increasing the use of recycled materials and reducing the harmful impacts of production, the Global Recycled Standard (GRS) sets requirements for third-party certification of recycled input in products—including chain of custody, social and environmental practices, and chemical restrictions.  

In 2019, we worked with bluesign® to eliminate harmful substances from their RSL (Restricted Substance List) at each step of our supply chain—from the chemical formulas, to the processes used to manufacture materials, and the products themselves. A bluesign® certification guarantees safer processes for workers and consumers as well as reduced air and water emissions.
fabric: Shell: 100% Recycled Nylon Lining: 100% Recycled Polyester Filling: 80% Recycled Down, 20% Recycled Feathers
